ThingDef.label: elasmobearium
ThingDef.description: The Elasmobearium is an hybrid of a bear and an ancient ancestor of a rhinoceros. The Elasmobearium is a pretty aggressive omnivore, using its horn to impale its victims and then mauling them with their vicious paws.\n\nUseful abilities: Aside from obviously being a very powerful creature, they produce a wool of excellent quality.

ThingDef.label: boomnotherium
ThingDef.description: The Boomnotherium is an hybrid between a boomalope and a large prehistoric relative of modern-day elephants. In latin, boomnotherium roughly translates as "terrible beast that will explode in your ass".\n\nUseful abilities: Boomnotheriums produce huge amounts of chemfuel, and they are "tanky", able to withstand a lot of abuse before exploding.

ThingDef.label: chickenlodon
ThingDef.description: The chickenlodon is a very weird cross between one of the most fearsome predators ever existing... and a chicken. A saber-toothed chicken, if you will.\n\nUseful abilities: The Chickenlodon lays eggs and is a very agile predator.

ThingDef.label: mantistanis
ThingDef.description: Mixing the genes of one of the biggest carnivorous birds ever existing and those of a praying mantis is either a genious idea, or anathema. The Mantistanis stalks its prey by standing incredibly still and launching itself to attack with lightning speed.\n\nUseful abilities: aggressive predator with slight regenerative properties.

ThingDef.label: paraceramuffalo
ThingDef.description: The Paraceratherium was the biggest land mammal to ever exist. When you hibridize it with a sturdy muffalo, the resulting creature is the most powerful pack animal ever created. Incredibly stubborn and bad-tempered, though.\n\nUseful abilities: Produces wool and milk, and acts as an incredibly strong pack beast.

ThingDef.label: lizardochs
ThingDef.description: The lizardochs is basically a reptilian bull, an hybrid between a lizard and the ancestor of domesticated cattle. The lizardochs needs little substenance to survive, at least for a creature of its size, and can be used as a pack animal, which makes it ideal to use in caravans through warm and dry lands such as deserts.\n\nUseful abilities: Produces milk, and acts as a pack animal that needs little food.

ThingDef.label: doedicoon
ThingDef.description: This armoured rodent is an hybrid of a raccoon and a Doedicurus. The Doedicoon breeds fast, and its armor can be useful in the frontlines.\n\nUseful abilities: Armoured rodent

ThingDef.label: thrumdraeodon
ThingDef.description: A huge, boar-like animal that will eat anything on its path. Thrumdraedons are cunning and resourceful.\n\nUseful abilities: thrumdraeodons are high-maintenance thrumbo hybrids, but they excell at combat.

ThingDef.label: wooly Wolf
ThingDef.description: Just like Wooly Mammoths and Wooly Rhinos, the Wooly Wolf is a creature perfectly adapted to cold climates. Wooly wolves are an excellent source of high quality wool, since they produce it much faster than a mammoth.\n\nUseful abilities: Fast wool production
